Interface IIscsiWriteTrx

  • All Superinterfaces:

    IscsiWriteTrx

    public interface IIscsiWriteTrx
extends IIscsiReadTrx

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void abort()
      Abort all modifications of the exclusive write transaction.
      void bootstrap(byte[] vals)
      This method inserts the given node into the database.
      void commit()
      Commit all modifications of the exclusive write transaction.
      void insertAfter(byte[] vals)
      This method inserts the given node, after the currently selected node and increments all following indizes.

      Remove currently selected node.
      void setValue(byte[] pValue)
      Set value of node.

        void commit()
            throws TTException
        Commit all modifications of the exclusive write transaction. Even commit if there are no modification at all.
        Throws:
